thread.section_title: MiniInTheBox 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 MiniInTheBox 的点评意见 | miniinthebox.com
thread.title: chandky

author: chandky
title: chandky
text: I order phone case in 1st of February after waiting for almost a month I got a wrong item. when my order was confirm, they even send me the item that I order with the picture, I was so glad to see that, and waiting all this time to get the item that order but at last I got the wrong cheaper item. They send me the cheaper item which I didn't like it and which I didn't even order it. This is very unfair and annoying. I didn't pay money, my sweat to be cheated.
